items.title: Clinical Management System
items.description: A clinical management system for managing appointments, medical records, prescriptions, internal chat, and role-based access for clinics.
items.challenge: Handling sensitive medical data securely while integrating a chatbot to assist with internal processes and improving operational efficiency.

items.challenge: Ensuring transactional integrity across sales, inventory updates, and financial movements using relational database transactions.

items.challenge: Working within an established team structure, following agile methodologies, handling tickets, and deploying through CI/CD pipelines for testing environments.
